SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.manager

Class AudioManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.manager.AudioManager
public class AudioManager extends Object
The AudioManager class is responsible for managing audio playback in the application. It follows the Singleton design pattern to ensure only one instance of the manager exists. The class handles preloading of audio files, playing background music, and sound effects.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • AudioManager

      private AudioManager()
      Private constructor for the AudioManager class. Initializes the soundEffects and preloadedMedia lists, and preloads all audio files.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AudioManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the AudioManager. This method is synchronized to ensure thread safety. If the instance is null, it initializes a new AudioManager instance.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of AudioManager

    • preloadAllAudio

      private void preloadAllAudio()
      Preloads all audio files used in the game. This method iterates through all sound effects and background music files defined in the GameConstant.FilePaths enumeration, preloading each audio file and setting the volume for specific sound effects. Preloaded sound effects are added to the soundEffects list.

    • preloadAudioClip

      private javafx.scene.media.AudioClip preloadAudioClip(String filename)
      Loads and returns an AudioClip from the specified filename.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the audio file.
      Returns:
      The AudioClip, or null if not found.

    • preloadMedia

      private void preloadMedia(String filename)
      Preloads a Media object for background music or other media files.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the media file.

    • playMusic

      public void playMusic(String filename)
      Plays background music from the specified file.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the music file.

    • stopMusic

      public void stopMusic()
      Stops the currently playing music if any, disposes of the media player, and sets the media player reference to null. This method checks if the media player is not null, stops the music, disposes of the media player resources, and then sets the media player reference to null to ensure it can be garbage collected.

    • loadMedia

      private javafx.scene.media.Media loadMedia(String filename)
      Loads and returns a Media object from the specified filename.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the media file.
      Returns:
      The Media object, or null if not found.

    • playSoundEffect

      public void playSoundEffect(int index)
      Plays a sound effect from the preloaded sound effects.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the sound effect to play.
